      • Scale

        public Scale(java.lang.String scaleName,
             java.lang.String keyname)
        Create a new scale
        Parameters:
        scaleName - name of scale (e.g. "Major")
        keyname - key of scale (e.g. "C#" )

    • Method Detail

        Get number of notes in scale

      • get

        public int get(int i)
        Get the MIDI pitch for the i-th note in the scale
        Parameters:

      • map2note

        public int map2note(float val,
                    float minval,
                    float maxval,
                    int offset,
                    int noctave)
        Map a value to a MIDI note within scale
        Parameters:
        val - value to map
        minval - minimum of range
        maxval - maximum of range
        offset - increase final pitch by offset steps in scale
        noctave - number of octaves (pitches cover center-most octaves of scale)
        Returns:
        MIDI note
